messages.title: Lib Dems top the poll
messages.content: The County Council election results have provided a massive boost to Layla Moran's campaign to be elected as our next MP. More people voted Lib Dem than for any other party across the Oxford West & Abingdon constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats pledge to invest £6 billion in NHS and social care.
The Liberal Democrats will put major investment back into all our schools.
Lib Dems introduced the triple-lock and will fight any Conservative plan to scrap it.

issues.brexitEurope: Layla is campaigning against the Government's hard Brexit approach which is strongly supported by Conservative candidate Nicola Blackwood.
issues.education: The Liberal Democrats will put major investment back into all our schools.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats pledge to invest £6 billion in NHS and social care.
issues.socialWelfare: Lib Dems introduced the triple-lock for pensions and will fight any Conservative plan to scrap it.

community.content: Plans pushed through by the Conservatives for massive housing developments locally are going ahead WITHOUT the infrastructure being delivered first.

quotes.text: Lib Dems pledge to invest £6 billion in NHS and social care
Liberal Democrats pledge £7bn education funding boost
Lib Dems promise to protect state pension triple lock

images.caption: Inset: Cllr. Paul Buckley who won the Wolvercote & Summertown seat with a majority of more than 1,000 votes over the Conservatives. Main picture: Layla Moran with Cllr. John Howson, who held his St. Margaret’s seat, and Paddy Ashdown.

Help Layla stop the Tory Dementia Tax
More people voted Lib Dem than for any other party across the Oxford West & Abingdon constituency.
Plans pushed through by the Conservatives for massive housing developments locally are going ahead WITHOUT the infrastructure being delivered first.

Plans pushed through by the Conservatives for massive housing developments locally are going ahead WITHOUT the infrastructure being delivered first.
Layla is campaigning against the Government's hard Brexit approach which is strongly supported by Conservative candidate Nicola Blackwood.
Help Layla stop the Tory Dementia Tax.
Nicola Blackwood claimed that she had won the battle to save our Children’s Centres.

Nicola Blackwood also claimed: 'She has secured commitment from the Treasury, Department of Transport, Highways Agency and County Council to fund and deliver a Diamond Junction at Lodge Hill Junction in Abingdon...'
